page.title: 12ADULT LEISURE IN OAKLEY AREA
page.content: A survey carried out on{adult}leisure activities in the area show that there is a fairly wide range of leisure pursuits available,but only a small percentage of the population take advantage of what is offered.The most {popular mixed adult}activity is undoubtedly the{bingo.}For ladies it is keep fit class.Men in the area enjoy playing football and snooker. darts are somewhat less popular. Recently a{country and western club} was formed where the participants enjoy country and western music and dress in cowboy fashion.One of the highlights is a regular 'shoot-out'. There are{2 betting shops}both well } frequented.Bowling,tennis,badminton angling,pigeon club and sequence dance class are available.Aerobics,carpet bowls and jazz classes are not so popular.
